feed.title: GoDoxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.13.1
entry.content:
Changes & Fixes

  • Security: disallow TLS1.0/1.1
  • OIDC: "invalid oauth state" error for WebUI

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.13.2
entry.content:
Changes & Fixes

  • Fixed #110 error parsing acl.allow / acl.deny
  • Fixed #110 incorrect maxmind not configured error
  • Fixed incorrect config loading behavior
  • Improved error formatting

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.13.3
entry.content:
Changes

  • WebUI: Refined Config Editor and System Info Charts
  • Metrics: Parallelize system information collection
  • Agent: use ECDSA P-256 instead of RSA 2048 for certificates
  • Health check: retry mechanism on error, stop after 5 trials
  • General: Optimize memory allocation and performance improvements

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.13.4
entry.content:
Changes / Fixes

Improvements

  • Autocert: allow specifying custom acme directory url (experimental)
  • WebUI: App tooltip no longer show up when right-click menu if opened
  • General: Improved memory and object lifecycle management
  • OIDC: restore old behavior - when user is allowed, allowed_group won't be checked, and vice-versa

Security

  • Use ECDSA P-256 for autocert obtained certs instead of RSA 2048

Misc

  • Websocket: replaces coder/websocket package with gorilla/websocket

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.13.5
entry.content:
Changes / Fixes

  • Fix reload stuck / error
  • Fix attempt for unknown format: &{} notification error
  • Fix attempt for occasional invalid oauth state error for OIDC
  • Add option to disable compression
